fields.description: Current list of Instabilties for this run.
fields.name: Instability

fields.description: Current list of Instabilties for this run.
fields.name: Instability

fields.description: The first non-Volatile Attack played each battle will be Upgraded and Cloned.
fields.name: The Lost Sword

fields.description: At the start of each turn, draw 1 extra card.
fields.name: Bottle of Whiskey

fields.description: Each time an enemy dies, Overcharge 1 and Block 3.
fields.name: Lucky Tooth

fields.description: At the start of your first turn, heal 7.
fields.name: Jar of Hearts

fields.description: Every 5 Block cards played, Draw 1.
fields.name: Spiked Shield

fields.description: At the start of each battle, apply Weak 2 to all enemies.
fields.name: Voodoo Doll

fields.description: At the start of your first turn, Rage 100%. If you are over 50% HP, gain 1 Energy.
fields.name: Prefight Meal

fields.description: Each time you draw a Bane, Draw 1.
fields.name: Wishbone

fields.description: If the first card you play in a turn costs 0, Draw 1.
fields.name: Silver Gauntlets

fields.description: Every 3 Swift cards played, apply Bleed 2 to all enemies.
fields.name: Fan of Blades

fields.description: The first non-Volatile Attack card played each turn will Rebound.
fields.name: Butcher's Blade

fields.description: Increase Max Energy by 1. At the start of your turn, you'll gain an additional +1 Energy.
fields.name: Book of Arcane Secrets

fields.description: Each time you play a Slash or Draw Blood, add 1 Hidden Blade to your hand.
fields.name: Lucky Shiv

fields.description: Each time you Expel a card, Draw 1.
fields.name: Dark Feather

fields.description: Each time you Expel a card, gain 1 Energy.
fields.name: Enchanted Waterbottle

fields.description: At the start of each EVEN turn, add 3 Hidden Blades to your hand.
fields.name: Trusty Fishhook

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Block 2.
fields.name: Wooden Shield

fields.description: After drawing your hand, for the duration of your turn, Block 1 each time you draw a card.
fields.name: Barbed Gauntlets

fields.description: Every 8 Attack cards played, Draw 1.
fields.name: Suspicious Blade Oil

fields.description: After you play your second card in a turn, Rage 50%.
fields.name: Flask of Red Juice

fields.description: Gain 1 Upgrade Point after each Perfect Victory.
fields.name: Flask of Purple Juice

fields.description: Reduce the cooldown of all Spells by 1.
fields.name: Spell Stone

fields.description: Receive a random Merchant Artifact of any rarity.
fields.name: Random Artifact

fields.description: You'll start all fights with your Energy at its maximum.
fields.name: Sugar Rush

fields.description: Whenever you suffer Daze cards, Delay Block 8.
fields.name: Rations

fields.description: Each time you gain a Void Stone that isn't already in a card, heal 15 HP.
fields.name: Apple a Day

fields.description: All enemies will spawn with Vulnerable 2.
fields.name: Mace of Skull Crushing

fields.description: At the start of each fight, 1 Celerity will be added to your Deck.
fields.name: Thief's Tools

fields.description: If you start a turn with 3 Energy or less, add a Volatile Side Step to your hand.
fields.name: Boots of Quickness

fields.description: The first card containing a Green Void Stone played each fight will be returned to the top of your deck, even if it would Expel, and you'll Overcharge 1.
fields.name: Card Tricks

fields.description: You are no longer affected by the enemy abilities Taunt and Evasive.
fields.name: Helm of Focus

fields.description: The first instance of HP loss each fight is reduced by half.
fields.name: Ablative Pauldron

fields.description: You can spend this at a Well of Stars to pick a second option from the top row.
fields.name: Silver Medal

fields.description: At the start of your first turn, Overcharge 4.
fields.name: Jumper Cables

fields.description: At the start of each battle, apply Weak 2 to all enemies and Delay Block 10.
fields.name: Vanguard Shield

fields.description: Each time you Purge an Ability card, deal 2 damage to the enemy with the lowest HP. Each time you Purge an Attack card, Block 1.
fields.name: Leather Gloves

fields.description: Gain +1 Max Energy every 2 turns. If you start your turn with 4 or more Energy, Block 2.
fields.name: Mobius Bracelet

fields.description: When applying a Debuff to an enemy not suffering from any Debuffs, double its value.
fields.name: Regal Monocle

fields.description: An Upgraded version of the first card you Purge in a fight will be added to your hand.
fields.name: Utility Belt

fields.description: Each time you play a Block card, Delay Block 5.
fields.name: Hand Mirror

fields.description: At the start of your first turn, Delay Block 15.
fields.name: Leftovers

fields.description: Every 6 Ability cards played, Rage 50%.
fields.name: Playbook

fields.description:
The first card you Purge each Battle will be Upgraded.
The first card you Purge each turn will return to your deck.
fields.name: Recycling Bin

fields.description: Viewing your deck during battle will show the correct ordering of cards.
fields.name: Looking Glass

fields.description: At the start of turn 4, apply Vulnerable 2, Weak 2 and Slow 2 to all enemies.
fields.name: Emergency Button

fields.description: You get 1 extra Max Energy for each 2 Soultithe you have.
fields.name: Meagre Offering

fields.description: On Turn 5, gain 10 Corruption.
fields.name: Caged Darkness

fields.description: Drinking any potion restores 8 HP. The 8th time this triggers, heal an additional 8 and the potion isn't consumed.
fields.name: Potion of Sourcery

fields.description: The first time you Purge a non-X cost card each turn, your Soultithe will be reduced by its Energy cost.
fields.name: Discarded Totem

fields.description: Yellow Void Stones will also grant Delay Block 4.
fields.name: Reinforced Stone

fields.description: If you have Soultithe at the end of your turn, reduce Soultithe by 1 and gain 1 Corruption.
fields.name: Page of Prayers

fields.description: The first Attack or Ability you Purge each turn has its Void Stone triggered.
fields.name: Forceps

fields.description: Every 8th time you gain Corruption, double the amount gained.
fields.name: Black Heart

fields.description: Red Void Stones will grant an additional Rage 25%.
fields.name: Rage Stone

fields.description: Upon reaching 40 Corruption for the first time each fight, heal 7.
fields.name: Black Cherry

fields.description: Each time you gain Corruption, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
fields.name: Rusty Scythe

fields.description: Each time you discard an Affliction card, Block 3.
fields.name: Cleansing Oil

fields.description: Gain Corruption and Delay Block at the end of the turn equal to leftover Energy.
fields.name: Unceasing Gear

fields.description: The first time you Sift each turn, Sift 1 more.
fields.name: Amethyst Spyglass

fields.description: Death Strike no longer has a minimum reduction of 1 after triggering, meaning 0 cost cards won't reduce it by 1.
fields.name: Bladed Staff

fields.description: Starting from Turn 3, your max Combo is increased by 1.
fields.name: Oversized Knife

fields.description: When a Bleeding enemy dies, apply 50% of their Bleed to a random enemy.
fields.name: Serpent's Skull

fields.description: Your max Combo is increased by 1.
fields.name: Twin Blade

fields.description: When playing a Balanced card at 0 Combo, Block 4.
fields.name: Mitten Gauntlet

fields.description: When playing a card that costs you 2 or more Energy, gain Combo 1.
fields.name: Throwing Star

fields.description: If you are below 50% HP at the start of your turn, apply Slow 1 to all enemies.
fields.name: Frozen Sphere

fields.description: When an enemy is brought below 65% HP, apply Weak 8 and Vulnerable 8 to them.
fields.name: Execution Order

fields.description: The 2nd card you Purge each turn causes all Debuffs suffered to be reduced by 1.
fields.name: Purifier Diadem

fields.description: After you cast your spell, apply Vulnerable 2 to a random enemy.
fields.name: Barbed Wand

fields.description: At the start of your first turn, Foresight 1.
fields.name: Crystal Ball

fields.description:
If you trigger Zen using an Attack Chain, gain 2 more card plays in Zen.
If you trigger Zen using an Ability Chain, draw 1 card.
If you trigger Zen using a Buff Chain, gain 3 Energy.
fields.name: Trusty Fork

fields.description: Whenever you play a card that doesn't match your current Chain, Block 4.
fields.name: Foot Wraps

fields.description: Each time you play a card whilst in Zen, Delay Block 1.
fields.name: Blessing Stone

fields.description: Whilst in Zen, your card play limit is increased by 2.
fields.name: Delay Stones

fields.description: At the end of your turn, gain charges equal to the number of Zen card plays left. At the start of your turn, if at 8 or higher, enter Zen.
fields.name: Pendant of Focus

fields.description: Start each battle with Echo Wall 2.
fields.name: Smelling Salts

fields.description: The first card Expelled each battle is Discarded instead.
fields.name: Time Portal

fields.description: Shii gains twice the bonus from Fatigue.
fields.name: Meditation Cushion

fields.description: All enemies spawn with Fatigue 1.
fields.name: Punching Bag

fields.description: After defeating an Elite, heal 15 HP.
fields.name: Green Tea

fields.description: When you enter Zen, Draw 1.
fields.name: Stoic Mask

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Block 2, +1 for each point of Fatigue across all enemies.
fields.name: Padded Robes

fields.description: The second time each turn you gain Combo, Combo 1.
fields.name: Amulet of Speed

fields.description: Every 4th battle round, trigger the Bleed of all enemies at the start of your turn.
fields.name: Hemolytic Vial

fields.description: Mousing over a Mob room will allow you to see which Mobs await inside. Every second battle, you'll start with Stealth, meaning that enemies will skip their first turn.
fields.name: The Seers Eye

fields.description: At the end of each battle, you will gain an additional 45 Essence.
fields.name: Untrustworthy Coinpurse

fields.description: Every 7th Attack card played will trigger an additional time.
fields.name: Band of Power

fields.description: Every 5th Block card played will trigger an additional time.
fields.name: Band of Resilience

fields.description: Increase the rate the Void Stone bar fills by 350%.
fields.name: Dwarven Beard Knot

fields.description: Each time you draw an Affliction, Rage 25%.
fields.name: Corrupted Heart

fields.description: Each time you reshuffle your deck, gain 3 Corruption for each Affliction reshuffled.
fields.name: Rotten Egg

fields.description: Every 5th time you Purge a card, Block 9.
fields.name: The Watcher

fields.description: The 2nd card you Purge each turn causes you to gain 2 Energy, instead of 1.
fields.name: Pickled Hand

fields.description:
If you end your turn with 0 Energy, Overcharge 1.
If you end your turn with 5 or more Energy, Delay Rage 25%.
fields.name: Wizard's Hat

fields.description: If you gain an amount of Block exactly equal to remaining Threat, Delay Block 10.
fields.name: Square Peg

fields.description: At the start of your turn, Block 3 for each unique Debuff you are suffering from.
fields.name: Penitent Seal

fields.description: Your first time each turn you gain Soultithe grants thrice the Corruption.
fields.name: Raven Hood

fields.description: Each time you gain Soultithe, Block 2.
fields.name: Human Shield

fields.description: Each time you play a card with the same name as a card already played this turn, Block 4.
fields.name: Fractal Feather

fields.description: Each time you start a turn with 20 or more Corruption, add 1 Volatile Soultax to your hand.
fields.name: Tax Ledger

fields.description: Gain 2 Corruption at the end of the turn if you hadn't played any Attacks that turn.
fields.name: Bleak Contract

fields.description: The first enemy you deal Future Strike to each Battle, apply Slow 2 to.
fields.name: Frozen Flower

fields.description: Deal 2 Future Strike, once, to a random enemy at the start of your turn.
fields.name: Clawed Chain

fields.description: Future Strike also triggers on Turn 3, and all enemies will gain 1 Fatigue after it triggers.
fields.name: Red Hourglass

fields.description: When applying Slow to an enemy with Fatigue that currently doesn't have Slow, increase the amount by 1.
fields.name: Hooked Bo

fields.description: Delay Block equal to half of unused Delay Block at the start of the turn.
fields.name: Echo Armour

fields.description: Upon Discarding 3 or more cards in the same turn, Overcharge 2.
fields.name: Dark Conduit

fields.description: When a enemy's Shii passes over half of their current HP, apply Slow 1 & Weak 1.
fields.name: Phantom Bolas

fields.description: Shii's Death Transfer is set to 100%.
fields.name: Spectral Candle

fields.description: When dealing Future Strike or Shii to a Slowed enemy, increase the amount dealt each time by 2.
fields.name: Steel Knuckles

fields.description: Whilst in Zen, playing an Attack does Delay Block 3, playing an Ability deals 3 Future Strike twice to a random enemy, and playing a Buff or Affliction does Block 6.
fields.name: Ornate Fork

fields.description: If the 1st card played in a turn had Opener, the Opener effect of your 2nd played card will trigger as well.
fields.name: Corkscrew

fields.description: When you have no active Chain, any card played will count as having Chain 1.
fields.name: Blessed Cuffs

fields.description: Every 3rd time you Delay Block, Block an equal amount.
fields.name: Knee Pads

fields.description: The first application of Shii each turn is doubled.
fields.name: Jade Mantis

fields.description: Each time a enemy takes a hit from Future Strike, apply Shii 1. This Shii is not modified by Fatigue.
fields.name: Hallowed Lotus

fields.description: At the start of your first turn, Sift 3.
fields.name: Long Pliers

fields.description: When you cast your Spell, Block equal to 3 times your Spell's cooldown.
fields.name: Spell Shield

fields.description: Each time you play an Attack, this artifact gains 1 charge. If you have 9 or more charges, playing a Block will cause it to trigger +1 times and consume 9 charges. Max 18 charges.
fields.name: Aegis of Ifraem

fields.description: If you kept a non-Affliction card in your hand at the end of the turn, you will Draw 1 more card at the start of the next turn.
fields.name: Carrying Case

fields.description: When you play your 4th Attack in one turn, gain 2 Hidden Blades.
fields.name: Blade Belt

fields.description: Every 12 Attack cards played, gain 3 Hidden Blades.
fields.name: Cutting Fan

fields.description: Block 3 for each Combo consumed.
fields.name: Basket-Hilted Broadsword

fields.description: Each time you cast your Spell, Combo 1.
fields.name: Runed Pommel

fields.description: Every 4th non-Balanced Swift Attack played is Balanced.
fields.name: Knave's Katar

fields.description: All of your Bleed-applying cards apply 1 more Bleed.
fields.name: Splattered Sawblade

fields.description: Every 12 Attack cards played, trigger Bleed on all creatures.
fields.name: Sanguine Stopwatch

fields.description:
Start each battle with Echo Wall 1.
Echo Wall only reflects 1/3rd of the damage, but you Delay Block equal to reflected damage.
fields.name: Glowing Brick

fields.description: Cards with a base cost of 2 or more will cost 0 while in Zen, but reduce your Zen card plays by their base cost.
fields.name: Prayer Box

fields.description: Each time an enemy attacks you, Delay Block equal to that enemy's Fatigue.
fields.name: Running Shoes

fields.description: Deal Shii to enemies equal to damage dealt by Echo Wall.
fields.name: Phantom Spike

fields.description: All Buff cards have Chain 2.
fields.name: Viridian Sash

fields.description: The first card you play each turn is Foreseen (after being played).
fields.name: Temporal Prism

fields.description: Each time you play an Attack, deal damage to all enemies equal to Fatigue stacks across all enemies.
fields.name: Micro Darts

fields.description: A partially-completed Chain doesn't reset at the end of the turn.
fields.name: Reformed Ring

fields.description: Every 3rd time you gain Rage, gain twice the amount. (This does not include Delay Rage being gained or triggered.)
fields.name: Paired Sai

fields.description: Delayed Block 1 each time you play a non-Ability card.
fields.name: Pocket Pagoda

fields.description: Start each turn with 1 Ability Chain.
fields.name: Straw Hat

fields.description: Your first Attack played in Zen each turn applies Weak 1.
fields.name: Sweaty Palm

fields.description: Opener will trigger on your first Opener card of the turn, even if it isn't your first card played.
fields.name: Tiny Gong

fields.description: At the end of the turn, before your Threat triggers, deal Shii 1 to all enemies an amount of times equal to your unused Zen card plays.
fields.name: Sapphire Sloth

fields.description: When you enter Zen, gain 100% Rage. Your next Attack this turn reduces Rage by 100%.
fields.name: Obsidian Fist

fields.description: When you Block, half of excess Block becomes Delay Block.
fields.name: Echo Cloak

fields.description: At the start of each Battle, apply Bleed 4 to all enemies.
fields.name: Exploding Pomegranate

fields.description: Delay Block 1 when Bleed is reduced or triggered.
fields.name: Crystalized Ichor

fields.description: Reduce all Clot costs by 1.
fields.name: Gauze

fields.description: Bleed triggers before enemy actions instead of after, and doesn't reduce down when triggered.
fields.name: Garnet Band

fields.description: Your Max Combo is 1 lower. When you play an Ability, Combo 1.
fields.name: Strange Stimulants

fields.description: The first Buff you play each turn costs 2 less.
fields.name: Gilded Sheath

fields.description: Whenever Bleed triggers or is reduced, Rage 25%. (Rage gained from passive Bleed triggering will immediately go away at the end of the turn.)
fields.name: Red Glasses

fields.description: Every 12th time you discard a card, deal 20 damage to all enemies.
fields.name: Midnight Clock

fields.description: The 4th card each turn you Purge or Discard is returned to your hand.
fields.name: Compost

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Block 1 for every 2 Soultithe.
fields.name: Abandoned Pet

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Discard 1, then Recur 1.
fields.name: Ballet Shoes

fields.description: Each time you Expel a card, gain 1 Corruption.
fields.name: Abacus

fields.description: Each time you reshuffle your deck, gain 3 Corruption for each Affliction reshuffled.
fields.name: Rotten Egg

fields.description: Starting from turn 2, draw 2 extra cards at the start of your turn, but gain 2 less Energy.
fields.name: 'Drinking' Alcohol

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Draw 1 and choose a card to place on the bottom of your Deck.
fields.name: Card Sharp's Sleeve

fields.description: Each time you Block, Block 1. Each time you Delay Block, Delay Block 1. This does not trigger itself.
fields.name: Performance Enhancers

fields.description: The first 5 times each Battle you Purge a Heavy card, Overcharge 1 and deal 6 damage to all enemies.
fields.name: Lightning Bolt Keychain

fields.description: The first time each Battle you play a Heavy card, Block 10 and deal 10 damage to all enemies.
fields.name: Spiked Pommel

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Threshold 1: Block 4 and Reduce Soultithe by 1.
fields.name: Ancient Idol

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Threshold 6: Soultithe 2 and Rage 50%.
fields.name: Iridescent Cloak

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Soultithe 1, gain 2 Corruption, and Block 1.
fields.name: Cursed Bracelet

fields.description: The first time each turn you Sift a non-Expel card, place a Volatile copy of it into your hand.
fields.name: Dragon Scale

fields.description: Each time you gain Soultithe, deal thrice that much damage to all enemies.
fields.name: Trained Attack Crow

fields.description: At the start of your turn, if you have less than 24 Corruption, apply Weak 1 to all enemies.
fields.name: Cracked Sundial

fields.description: Each turn, the first time you Draw during your turn, Draw 1, Discard 1, and gain 1 Corruption.
fields.name: Pale Butterfly

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Vision 1.
fields.name: Scrying Pool

fields.description: At the start of each Battle, apply Slow 2 to all enemies.
fields.name: Quartz Crane

fields.description: When you enter Zen, Block 4. If you have no Threat, Rage 25%.
fields.name: Topaz Tiger

fields.description: From turn 4 onward, draw 1 extra card at the start of your turn.
fields.name: Overstuffed Pouch

fields.description: If you have less than 3 attacks at the start of your turn, add a Volatile Stability to hand. If you have less than 3 abilities at the start of your turn, add a Volatile Clarity to hand.
fields.name: Bell of Clarity

fields.description: If your Threat is 0 at the start of your turn, Rage 100%.
fields.name: Red Pills

fields.description: Every 3rd turn, your Threat stack won't trigger.
fields.name: Camo Cloak

fields.description: The first time each turn you play an Attack card, add a Volatile Light It Up to your hand.
fields.name: Light Bulb

fields.description: At the start of each turn, apply Bleed 2 to all Vulnerable enemies. For each Weak enemy, Block 2. For each Slow enemy, Delay Block 2.
fields.name: Glass Prism

fields.description: At the end of every even turn, deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of cards in your Expel and Destroy piles.
fields.name: Forgotten Fuse

fields.description: At the end of your turn, apply Bleed 1 to all enemies for each card you drew that turn (after drawing your starting hand).
fields.name: Card Spikes

fields.description: Each turn, the first time you spend Combo, Draw 1.
fields.name: Combo Platter

fields.description: Each time you Expel a card, Combo 1.
fields.name: Modern Art

fields.description: When you lose health, trigger all Bleed.
fields.name: Living Blood

fields.description: Each turn, the first time you Discard, Draw & Discard 1.
fields.name: Everlasting Sapphire

fields.description: Add 10 Void Coins to Discard at the start of each battle.
fields.name: Nest Egg

fields.description: Every 10th time you gain Corruption, Death Strike 1.
fields.name: Chalice of Evil

fields.description: The first time each turn you spend Death Strike, Death Strike 1.
fields.name: Red Nail Polish

fields.description: The first time each turn you Expel a card, add 2 Void Coins to Discard.
fields.name: Traveller's Cheque

fields.description: After you finish Sifting 1 or more cards, add a Void Coin to Discard.
fields.name: Phoenix Feather

fields.description: The second time each turn you gain Rage, Death Strike 1.
fields.name: Barbed Bracelet

fields.description: At the start of each turn, add a Void Coin to hand.
fields.name: Memory Box

fields.description: Receive a random Common Merchant Artifact.
fields.name: Random Common Artifact

fields.description: Receive a random Uncommon Merchant Artifact.
fields.name: Random Uncommon Artifact

fields.description: Receive a random Rare Merchant Artifact.
fields.name: Random Rare Artifact

fields.description: Unlock all Zeal Powers. At the start of each turn, Zeal 2.
fields.name: Codex of Ultimate Fervour

fields.description:
When you reach Zeal 3, trigger your Zeal 3 power an extra time.
When you reach Zeal 5, trigger your Zeal 5 power an extra time.
fields.name: Champion's Banner

fields.description: At the start of each turn, gain 2 Energy and your next card costs 1 more.
fields.name: Power Glove

fields.description: The first time each turn you hit 50% Rage, Overcharge 1.
fields.name: Hand-Cranked Lantern

fields.description: Each time you play a Buff card, Overcharge 1.
fields.name: Dynamo

fields.description: The first time each turn you Discharge, apply Shock 6 to the highest HP enemy.
fields.name: Energy Redirector

fields.description: Each time you apply Shock, apply 1 more.
fields.name: Conductive Paste

fields.description: Every 3rd time you gain Rage, gain twice as much. (This does not include Delay Rage being gained or triggered.)
fields.name: Paired Rapiers

fields.description: If you play an X cost card for 3 or more energy, Overcharge 1 and Zeal 2.
fields.name: Divine Hammer

fields.description: At the end of your turn, Delay Block equal to half your Zeal.
fields.name: Scutum of Faith

fields.description: Every 4th time you play a Block card, recur a random Heavy card.
fields.name: Iron Scabbard

fields.description: Each time you Expel a card, Delay Rage 25% and Zeal 1.
fields.name: Doomsday Pamphlet

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Discharge 1: Gain 1 Energy.
fields.name: Tesla Trident

fields.description: Each time Shock is reduced on an enemy, Block 2.
fields.name: Magnetic Pavise

fields.description: For each Overcharge reduced, Block 1.
fields.name: Winged Circlet

fields.description: The first Attack played each turn has Discharge 1: Ghost.
fields.name: Spirit Flail

fields.description: If you start your turn with 7 or more Energy, apply Vulnerable 1 to all enemies.
fields.name: Redeemer's Lash

fields.description: Green Void Stones will also Overcharge 1.
fields.name: Conductor Stone

fields.description: Each time you gain Tempo (your next card costs X more/less), Rage 25% and Delay Rage 25%.
fields.name: Tireless Greaves

fields.description: Every 7th card you play gives double its cost in Zeal.
fields.name: Warhorn

fields.description: Each time you pay 4 or more energy for a card, add an Upgraded Volatile Clashing Steel to your hand.
fields.name: Anointed Breastplate

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Zeal 1.
fields.name: Marching Drum

fields.description: At the start of every EVEN turn, Zeal 2.
fields.name: Flashy Baton

fields.description: The first time each turn you play an Attack card, Rage 25%.
fields.name: Jousting Lance

fields.description: If you have less than 5 Overcharge at the start of your turn, Delay Block 4.
fields.name: Delicious Crust

fields.description: At the end of each turn, for each 25% Rage you have, apply Bleed 1 to all enemies.
fields.name: Orb of Aneurysm

fields.description: Each turn, the first time you spend Combo, add 1 Hidden Blade to hand.
fields.name: Cheese Knife

fields.description: Each time you play a Buff card, your max Combo is increased by 1.
fields.name: Dashing Hat

fields.description: Start each turn at max Combo.
fields.name: Spice

fields.description: Each time you play a 0 cost card, Delay Rage 25%.
fields.name: Farmer's Falx

fields.description: The first time each turn you hit 50% Rage, Combo 1.
fields.name: Blackjack

fields.description: At the end of each turn, spend 1 Combo to Delay Draw 1.
fields.name: Caltrops

fields.description: For each Combo gained past your max, Block 6.
fields.name: Fencing Mask

fields.description: At the start of each turn, each enemy suffers Clot 2: Apply Weak 1.
fields.name: Fistful of Salt

fields.description: Every 5th time you generate a Hidden Blade or Silent Shiv, Rage 50%.
fields.name: Assassin's Arsenal

fields.description: If you end your turn with Overcharge equal to a multiple of 5, Delay Rage 25% and Delay Block 3.
fields.name: Perfect Level

fields.description: The first time each battle you reduce your Overcharge to 0, Overcharge 2.
fields.name: Granola Bar

fields.description: The first time each battle you apply Shock, apply 8 more.
fields.name: Lemon Battery

fields.description: If you end your turn with 2, 4, 6 or 9 Zeal, gain 1 Energy.
fields.name: Hymn Book

fields.description: All Buff cards give double their cost in Zeal.
fields.name: Parade Tuba

fields.description: Every time you trigger a Zeal power, apply Shock 2 to the highest HP enemy.
fields.name: Electrometronome

fields.description: At the end of each turn, Delay Block 4, +1 for every 25% Rage you have.
fields.name: Stress Toy

fields.description:
At the end of each turn, if your Overcharge is EVEN, apply Weak 2 to the highest HP enemy.
If ODD, apply Vulnerable 2 instead.
fields.name: Leaky Wires

fields.description: Every 3rd time you Discharge, you don't spend any Overcharge.
fields.name: Bulging Capacitor

fields.description: The first time each turn you play a card with a modified cost, your next card costs -1.
fields.name: Loyalty Card

fields.description: At the end of turn 3, apply Shock equal to twice your Overcharge to the highest HP enemy, and Shock equal to your Overcharge to the others.
fields.name: First Generation Transformer

fields.description: If you've gained 30 or more Zeal this fight, at the start of every turn, Draw 2 & Discard 1.
fields.name: Solar Panel

fields.description: If you end your turn with less than 5 Overcharge, upgrade 1 card from your deck. Otherwise, apply Shock 3 to all enemies.
fields.name: Perpetual Motion Device

fields.description: Zeal 1 each time you play a non-Volatile Uncommon card. Zeal 2 each time you play a non-Volatile Rare card.
fields.name: Fabled Relic

fields.description: Every 3rd X-cost card you play counts X as being 3 higher.
fields.name: Miracle Halberd

fields.description: The first time each turn you reach Zeal 8, Zeal 2 and Rage 25%.
fields.name: Apocalypse Trumpet

fields.description: At the start of each turn, draw 1 more card but gain 1 less Energy.
fields.name: Nip of 'Drinking' Alcohol

fields.description: The first time each turn you trigger a Red, Blue, Yellow or Purple Void Stone, get twice the effect.
fields.name: Jeweler's Loupe

fields.description: The first time each turn you draw an Affliction, Block 5.
fields.name: Paper Talisman

fields.description: At the start of your turn, draw 2 extra cards and suffer Hex 1.
fields.name: Monkey's Paw

fields.description: At the start of each turn, gain 2 energy. At the end of each turn, lose 2 energy.
fields.name: Broken Shifter

fields.description: When you end your turn with 10 or less Threat, your Threat stack doesn't trigger, leaving it for next turn.
fields.name: Liquid Membrane

fields.description: Each time you play a card with a Void Stone, Block 1, Delay Block 1 and deal 1 damage to all enemies.
fields.name: Stone Sling

fields.description: If you kept an Attack card in your hand from the last turn, Block 7. If you kept an Ability card in your hand from the last turn, Rage 50%. If you kept a Buff card in your hand from the last turn, gain 1 Energy.
fields.name: Tool Case

fields.description: If you play a card without a Void Stone, charge this artifact. When you draw a non-stoned card, expend the charge to add a non-green Void Stone to it.
fields.name: Bezel Wire

fields.description: When you draw a card with Prayer Beads, draw 1 more.
fields.name: Bigger Beads

fields.description: Cards you Foresee are moved to the top of your deck.
fields.name: Favoured Flags

fields.description: The second card played each turn has Desync and Chain 1, allowing it to contribute to a different Chain type.
fields.name: Copy Cat

fields.description: Follow-Up and Zen conditions on cards always count as met.
fields.name: Blindfold

fields.description: The first time each enemy suffers Fatigue, they suffer 1 more.
fields.name: Smokey Censer

fields.description: All Rigged cards have Chain 1.
fields.name: Winning Tile

fields.description: For the first 3 turns of each battle, enter Zen when you hit 2 Chain instead of 3.
fields.name: Rice Balls

fields.description: At the end of each turn, deal 1 damage to each enemy for every 8 Shii they have.
fields.name: Plum Blossom Needles

fields.description: At the end of each turn, if only one enemy is alive, deal 2 Shii to them an amount of times equal to the battle round.
fields.name: Emei Soul Piercer

fields.description: If you keep non-Affliction cards in your hand at the end of your turn, Foresee them.
fields.name: Dreamcatcher

fields.description: Each time an enemy dies, gain 4 Corruption.
fields.name: Obituary

fields.description: After playing a card, Soultithe 1 for each Threshold you failed to meet.
fields.name: Rubber Band

fields.description: Start each battle with Death Strike 1 and Rage 25%.
fields.name: Red Hot Chili Pepper

fields.description: The first time each battle you discard a card from your hand, Block 10 and apply Weak 1 to all enemies.
fields.name: Matador Cape

fields.description: At the start of turn 3, after drawing your hand, Recur 1.
fields.name: Trusty Rod

fields.description: Thresholds always count as met.
fields.name: Silver Spoon

fields.description: Each time you play or purge a card, gain 1 Corruption.
fields.name: Big Book of Law

fields.description: At the start of each turn, Death Strike 1.
fields.name: Reaper's Right

fields.description: Every 3rd time you play a card that does damage based on Corruption, deal 100% Corruption damage to all enemies.
fields.name: Executive Toy

fields.description: At the end of the turn, if you gained more than 12 Corruption, add 2 Void Coins to the top of your deck. Otherwise, gain 2 Corruption and apply Slow 1 to all enemies.
fields.name: Counterfeit

fields.description: If you start your turn with Death Strike, Rage 25% and gain 1 Corruption. The first time after playing a card that spends Death Strike each turn, Rage 25%.
fields.name: Acrylic Nails

fields.description: If you apply Slow (x) to an enemy, apply Weak (x) and Vulnerable (x) as well. The first time an enemy reinforcement spawns in each fight, apply Slow 1 to it.
fields.name: Bloody Bait

fields.description: The first time you're reduced to 0 HP, remove this item and heal back to 30%.
fields.name: In Emergency, Break Glass

fields.description: Overcharge grants 2 Energy.
fields.name: Trusty Snack

fields.description: The first time you apply Bleed in a turn, Block 3.
fields.name: Blood Amulet

fields.description: At the start of your turn, apply Bleed 2 to a random enemy.
fields.name: Haemorrhage Shrooms

fields.description: If an enemy has Bleed at the start of your turn, draw 1 card and apply Bleed 2 to all enemies.
fields.name: Four Leaf Clover

fields.description: Whenever you use a Potion, apply Bleed 8 to all enemies.
fields.name: Poisoning Kit

fields.description: The first time each turn you apply Bleed to an enemy, also apply Vulnerable 1.
fields.name: Thorny Bramble

fields.description: Lower all Debuffs suffered by 1 for each left over Energy at the end of the turn.
fields.name: Holy Effigy

fields.description: After winning a Battle, gain 100 Essence if it was Perfect. Otherwise, Heal 8.
fields.name: Coin of Good Fortune

fields.description: Every 8th Ability card played will cost 0 Energy.
fields.name: Obsidian Crown

fields.description: At the start of your turn, Block equal to the current Battle Round.
fields.name: Flame Shield

fields.description: Every 10 cards played, deal 10 damage to all enemies.
fields.name: Torch of Triumph

fields.description: At the start of each battle, lose 1 Energy and choose a card from your Deck to add to your hand.
fields.name: Discarded Keys

fields.description: Each time you cast your Spell, increase this item by 1. When it reaches 3, Rage 50% and your Spell's cooldown will be reset.
fields.name: Stew of Bad Memories

fields.description: Each time your deck is reshuffled, Block 10.
fields.name: Dead Man's Drop

fields.description: Every 3rd Heavy card played will cost -3. The first time each Battle you play a Heavy card, Upgrade it and add a Red Void Stone to it.
fields.name: Crystal Lake Hand-me-down

fields.description: Every 7th card played will cost 1 less Energy.
fields.name: Eldritch Blessing

fields.description: Every 6th Attack card played is returned to your hand, instead of being discarded, Expelled or Destroyed.
fields.name: Like Clockwork

fields.description: Each time you play a Buff card, Delay Block 10.
fields.name: Cultist Ward

fields.description: Each time you kill a non-minion enemy, your Spell's cooldown will be reset.
fields.name: Bloody Ledger

fields.description:
After every second fight, you'll find a Potion.
When you Brew a Potion, Delay Block 8.
When you use a Belt Potion, Block 8.
fields.name: Keg of Lucky Rum

fields.description:
Gain 1 Corruption when you Purge a card, and any Energy gained past your max turns into Corruption.
You can remove Void Stones from cards by Right Clicking the card in the Deck Manager.
fields.name: Void Manipulator

fields.description:
At the start of each turn, if at Combo 0, Combo 1.
Starting from Turn 4, your max Combo is increased by 1.
fields.name: Sneak Artist

fields.description: Every 3rd time you enter Zen, Draw 1. At the end of every EVEN turn, all enemies will suffer 1 Fatigue.
fields.name: Prayer Beads

fields.description:
You have +1 Max Energy.
When you start a turn at 5+ Overcharge, gain +1 Energy.
When you start a turn at 15+ Overcharge, gain +2 Energy instead.
Lose 1 Overcharge for each Energy gained by Storm Brand.
fields.name: Storm Brand
